00025 if (!defined('SENAYAN_BASE_DIR')) {

00032 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';

00040 // privileges checking
00041 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00042 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'w');
00043 
00044 if (!$can_read) {
00045     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00046 }
00047 
00048 $in_pop_up = false;
00049 // check if we are inside pop-up window
00050 if (isset($_GET['inPopUp'])) {
00051     $in_pop_up = true;
00052 }
00053 
00054 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00055 if (isset($_POST['saveData']) AND $can_read AND $can_write) {
00056     $title = trim(strip_tags($_POST['title']));
00057     // check form validity
00058     if (empty($title)) {
00059         utility::jsAlert(__('Title can not be empty'));
00060         exit();
00061     } else {
00062         $data['title'] = $dbs->escape_string($title);
00063         $data['edition'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['edition'])));
00064         $data['gmd_id'] = $_POST['gmdID'];
00065         $data['isbn_issn'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['isbn_issn'])));
00066         $data['classification'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['class'])));
00067         // check publisher
00068         if ($_POST['publisherID'] != '0') {
00069             $data['publisher_id'] = intval($_POST['publisherID']);
00070         } else {
00071             if (!empty($_POST['publ_search_str'])) {
00072                 $new_publisher = trim(strip_tags($_POST['publ_search_str']));
00073                 $new_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_publisher', 'publisher_id', 'publisher_name', $new_publisher);
00074                 if ($new_id) {
00075                     $data['publisher_id'] = $new_id;
00076                 } else {
00077                     $data['publisher_id'] = 'literal{NULL}';
00078                 }
00079             } else {
00080                 $data['publisher_id'] = 'literal{NULL}';
00081             }
00082         }
00083         $data['publish_year'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['year'])));
00084         $data['collation'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['collation'])));
00085         $data['series_title'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['seriesTitle'])));
00086         $data['call_number'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['callNumber'])));
00087         $data['language_id'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['languageID'])));
00088         // check place
00089         if ($_POST['placeID'] != '0') {
00090             $data['publish_place_id'] = intval($_POST['placeID']);
00091         } else {
00092             if (!empty($_POST['plc_search_str'])) {
00093                 $new_place = trim(strip_tags($_POST['plc_search_str']));
00094                 $new_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_place', 'place_id', 'place_name', $new_place);
00095                 if ($new_id) {
00096                     $data['publish_place_id'] = $new_id;
00097                 } else {
00098                     $data['publish_place_id'] = 'literal{NULL}';
00099                 }
00100             } else {
00101                 $data['publish_place_id'] = 'literal{NULL}';
00102             }
00103         }
00104         $data['notes'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['notes'])));
00105         $data['opac_hide'] = ($_POST['opacHide'] == '0')?'literal{0}':'1';
00106         $data['promoted'] = ($_POST['promote'] == '0')?'literal{0}':'1';
00107         // labels
00108         $arr_label = array();
00109         foreach ($_POST['labels'] as $label) {
00110             if (trim($label) != '') {
00111                 $arr_label[] = array($label, isset($_POST['label_urls'][$label])?$_POST['label_urls'][$label]:null );
00112             }
00113         }
00114         $data['labels'] = $arr_label?serialize($arr_label):'literal{NULL}';
00115         $data['frequency_id'] = ($_POST['frequencyID'] == '0')?'literal{0}':(integer)$_POST['frequencyID'];
00116         $data['spec_detail_info'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['specDetailInfo'])));
00117         $data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00118         $data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00119         // image uploading
00120         if (!empty($_FILES['image']) AND $_FILES['image']['size']) {
00121             // create upload object
00122             $image_upload = new simbio_file_upload();
00123             $image_upload->setAllowableFormat($sysconf['allowed_images']);
00124             $image_upload->setMaxSize($sysconf['max_image_upload']*1024);
00125             $image_upload->setUploadDir(IMAGES_BASE_DIR.'docs');
00126             // upload the file and change all space characters to underscore
00127             $img_upload_status = $image_upload->doUpload('image', preg_replace('@\s+@i', '_', $_FILES['image']['name']));
00128             if ($img_upload_status == UPLOAD_SUCCESS) {
00129                 $data['image'] = $dbs->escape_string($image_upload->new_filename);
00130                 // write log
00131                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' upload image file '.$image_upload->new_filename);
00132                 utility::jsAlert(__('Image Uploaded Successfully'));
00133             } else {
00134                 // write log
00135                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', 'ERROR : '.$_SESSION['realname'].' FAILED TO upload image file '.$image_upload->new_filename.', with error ('.$image_upload->error.')');
00136                 utility::jsAlert(__('Image Uploaded Successfully'));
00137             }
00138         }
00139 
00140         // create sql op object
00141         $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00142         if (isset($_POST['updateRecordID'])) {
00143             /* UPDATE RECORD MODE */
00144             // remove input date
00145             unset($data['input_date']);
00146             // filter update record ID
00147             $updateRecordID = (integer)$_POST['updateRecordID'];
00148             // update the data
00149             $update = $sql_op->update('biblio', $data, 'biblio_id='.$updateRecordID);
00150             // send an alert
00151             if ($update) {
00152                 utility::jsAlert(__('Bibliography Data Successfully Updated'));
00153                 // write log
00154                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' update bibliographic data ('.$data['title'].') with biblio_id ('.$_POST['itemID'].')');
00155                 // close window OR redirect main page
00156                 if ($in_pop_up) {
00157                     $itemCollID = (integer)$_POST['itemCollID'];
00158                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.opener.setContent(\'mainContent\', parent.opener.getLatestAJAXurl(), \'post\', \''.( $itemCollID?'itemID='.$itemCollID.'&detail=true':'' ).'\');</script>';
00159                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.window.close();</script>';
00160                 } else {
00161                     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', parent.getPreviousAJAXurl(), \'get\');</script>';
00162                 }
00163             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Bibliography Data FAILED to Updated. Please Contact System Administrator')."\n".$sql_op->error); }
00164             exit();
00165         } else {
00166             /* INSERT RECORD MODE */
00167             // insert the data
00168             $insert = $sql_op->insert('biblio', $data);
00169             if ($insert) {
00170                 // get auto id of this record
00171                 $last_biblio_id = $sql_op->insert_id;
00172                 // add authors
00173                 if ($_SESSION['biblioAuthor']) {
00174                     foreach ($_SESSION['biblioAuthor'] as $author) {
00175                         $sql_op->insert('biblio_author', array('biblio_id' => $last_biblio_id, 'author_id' => $author[0], 'level' => $author[1]));
00176                     }
00177                 }
00178                 // add topics
00179                 if ($_SESSION['biblioTopic']) {
00180                     foreach ($_SESSION['biblioTopic'] as $topic) {
00181                         $sql_op->insert('biblio_topic', array('biblio_id' => $last_biblio_id, 'topic_id' => $topic[0], 'level' => $topic[1]));
00182                     }
00183                 }
00184                 // add attachment
00185                 if ($_SESSION['biblioAttach']) {
00186                     foreach ($_SESSION['biblioAttach'] as $attachment) {
00187                         $sql_op->insert('biblio_attachment', array('biblio_id' => $last_biblio_id, 'file_id' => $attachment['file_id'], 'access_type' => $attachment['access_type']));
00188                     }
00189                 }
00190                 utility::jsAlert(__('New Bibliography Data Successfully Saved'));
00191                 // write log
00192                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' insert bibliographic data ('.$data['title'].') with biblio_id ('.$last_biblio_id.')');
00193                 // clear related sessions
00194                 $_SESSION['biblioAuthor'] = array();
00195                 $_SESSION['biblioTopic'] = array();
00196                 $_SESSION['biblioAttach'] = array();
00197                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/index.php\', \'post\', \'itemID='.$last_biblio_id.'&detail=true\');</script>';
00198             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Bibliography Data FAILED to Save. Please Contact System Administrator')."\n".$sql_op->error); }
00199             exit();
00200         }
00201     }
00202     exit();
00203 } else if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00204     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00205         die();
00206     }
00207     /* DATA DELETION PROCESS */
00208     // create sql op object
00209     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00210     $failed_array = array();
00211     $error_num = 0;
00212     $still_have_item = array();
00213     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00214         // make an array
00215         $_POST['itemID'] = array((integer)$_POST['itemID']);
00216     }
00217     // loop array
00218     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00219         $itemID = (integer)$itemID;
00220         // check if this biblio data still have an item
00221         $biblio_item_q = $dbs->query('SELECT b.title, COUNT(item_id) FROM biblio AS b
00222             LEFT JOIN item AS i ON b.biblio_id=i.biblio_id
00223             WHERE b.biblio_id='.$itemID.' GROUP BY title');
00224         $biblio_item_d = $biblio_item_q->fetch_row();
00225         if ($biblio_item_d[1] < 1) {
00226             if (!$sql_op->delete('biblio', "biblio_id=$itemID")) {
00227                 $error_num++;
00228             } else {
00229                 // write log
00230                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' DELETE bibliographic data ('.$biblio_item_d[0].') with biblio_id ('.$itemID.')');
00231                 // delete related data
00232                 $sql_op->delete('biblio_topic', "biblio_id=$itemID");
00233                 $sql_op->delete('biblio_author', "biblio_id=$itemID");
00234                 $sql_op->delete('biblio_attachment', "biblio_id=$itemID");
00235             }
00236         } else {
00237             $still_have_item[] = substr($biblio_item_d[0], 0, 45).'... still have '.$biblio_item_d[1].' copies';
00238             $error_num++;
00239         }
00240     }
00241 
00242     if ($still_have_item) {
00243         $titles = '';
00244         foreach ($still_have_item as $title) {
00245             $titles .= $title."\n";
00246         }
00247         utility::jsAlert(__('Below data can not be deleted:')."\n".$titles);
00248         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00249         exit();
00250     }
00251     // error alerting
00252     if ($error_num == 0) {
00253         utility::jsAlert(__('All Data Successfully Deleted'));
00254         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00255     } else {
00256         utility::jsAlert(__('Some or All Data NOT deleted successfully!\nPlease contact system administrator'));
00257         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00258     }
00259     exit();
00260 }
00261 /* RECORD OPERATION END */

00263 if (!$in_pop_up) {
00264 /* search form */
00265 ?>
00266 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00267 <div class="menuBoxInner biblioIcon">
00268     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Bibliographic')); ?> - <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/index.php?action=detail', 'get');" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Add New Bibliography'); ?></a>
00269     &nbsp; <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/index.php', 'post');" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Bibliographic List'); ?></a>
00270     <hr />
00271     <form name="search" action="blank.html" target="blindSubmit" onsubmit="$('doSearch').click();" id="search" method="get" style="display: inline;"><?php echo __('Search'); ?> :
00272     <input type="text" name="keywords" id="keywords" size="30" />
00273     <select name="field"><option value="0"><?php echo __('All Fields'); ?></option><option value="title"><?php echo __('Title/Series Title'); ?> </option><option value="subject"><?php echo __('Topics'); ?></option><option value="author"><?php echo __('Authors'); ?></option><option value="isbn"><?php echo __('ISBN/ISSN'); ?></option><option value="publisher"><?php echo __('Publisher'); ?></option></select>
00274     <input type="button" id="doSearch" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/index.php?' + $('search').serialize(), 'post')" value="<?php echo __('Search'); ?>" class="button" />
00275     </form>
00276 </div>
00277 </fieldset>
00278 <?php
00279 /* search form end */

00281 /* main content */
00282 if (isset($_POST['detail']) OR (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'detail')) {
00283     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00284         die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00285     }
00286     /* RECORD FORM */
00287     // try query
00288     $itemID = (integer)isset($_POST['itemID'])?$_POST['itemID']:0;
00289     $rec_q = $dbs->query('SELECT b.*, p.publisher_name, pl.place_name FROM biblio AS b
00290         LEFT JOIN mst_publisher AS p ON b.publisher_id=p.publisher_id
00291         LEFT JOIN mst_place AS pl ON b.publish_place_id=pl.place_id
00292         WHERE biblio_id='.$itemID);
00293     $rec_d = $rec_q->fetch_assoc();
00294 
00295     // create new instance
00296     $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'], 'post');
00297     $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Save').'" class="button"';
00298     // form table attributes
00299     $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00300     $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00301     $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00302 
00303     $visibility = 'makeVisible';
00304     // edit mode flag set
00305     if ($rec_q->num_rows > 0) {
00306         $form->edit_mode = true;
00307         // record ID for delete process
00308         if (!$in_pop_up) {
00309             // form record id
00310             $form->record_id = $itemID;
00311         } else {
00312             $form->addHidden('updateRecordID', $itemID);
00313             $form->addHidden('itemCollID', $_POST['itemCollID']);
00314             $form->back_button = false;
00315         }
00316         // form record title
00317         $form->record_title = $rec_d['title'];
00318         // submit button attribute
00319         $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Update').'" class="button"';
00320         // element visibility class toogle
00321         $visibility = 'makeHidden';
00322     }
00323 
00324     /* Form Element(s) */
00325     // biblio title
00326     $form->addTextField('textarea', 'title', __('Title').'*', $rec_d['title'], 'rows="1" style="width: 100%; overflow: auto;"');
00327     // biblio edition
00328     $form->addTextField('text', 'edition', __('Edition'), $rec_d['edition'], 'style="width: 40%;"');
00329     // biblio specific detail info/area
00330     $form->addTextField('textarea', 'specDetailInfo', __('Specific Detail Info'), $rec_d['spec_detail_info'], 'rows="2" style="width: 100%"');
00331     // biblio item add
00332     if (!$in_pop_up AND $form->edit_mode) {
00333         $str_input = '<div class="makeHidden"><a href="javascript: openWin(\''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/pop_item.php?inPopUp=true&action=detail&biblioID='.$rec_d['biblio_id'].'\', \'popItem\', 600, 400, true)">'.__('Add New Items').'</a></div>';
00334         $str_input .= '<iframe name="itemIframe" id="itemIframe" class="borderAll" style="width: 100%; height: 70px;" src="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_item_list.php?biblioID='.$rec_d['biblio_id'].'"></iframe>'."\n";
00335         $form->addAnything('Item(s) Data', $str_input);
00336     }
00337     // biblio authors
00338         $str_input = '<div class="'.$visibility.'"><a href="javascript: openWin(\''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/pop_author.php?biblioID='.$rec_d['biblio_id'].'\', \'popAuthor\', 500, 200, true)">'.__('Add Author(s)').'</a></div>';
00339         $str_input .= '<iframe name="authorIframe" id="authorIframe" class="borderAll" style="width: 100%; height: 70px;" src="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_author.php?biblioID='.$rec_d['biblio_id'].'"></iframe>';
00340     $form->addAnything(__('Author(s)'), $str_input);
00341     // biblio gmd
00342         // get gmd data related to this record from database
00343         $gmd_q = $dbs->query('SELECT gmd_id, gmd_name FROM mst_gmd');
00344         $gmd_options = array();
00345         while ($gmd_d = $gmd_q->fetch_row()) {
00346             $gmd_options[] = array($gmd_d[0], $gmd_d[1]);
00347         }
00348     $form->addSelectList('gmdID', __('GMD'), $gmd_options, $rec_d['gmd_id']);
00349     // biblio publish frequencies
00350         // get frequency data related to this record from database
00351         $freq_q = $dbs->query('SELECT frequency_id, frequency FROM mst_frequency');
00352         $freq_options[] = array('0', strtoupper(__('Not Applicable')));
00353         while ($freq_d = $freq_q->fetch_row()) {
00354             $freq_options[] = array($freq_d[0], $freq_d[1]);
00355         }
00356         $str_input = simbio_form_element::selectList('frequencyID', $freq_options, $rec_d['frequency_id']);
00357         $str_input .= '&nbsp;';
00358         $str_input .= ' '.__('Use this for Serial publication');
00359     $form->addAnything(__('Frequency'), $str_input);
00360     // biblio ISBN/ISSN
00361     $form->addTextField('text', 'isbn_issn', __('ISBN/ISSN'), $rec_d['isbn_issn'], 'style="width: 40%;"');
00362     // biblio classification
00363     $form->addTextField('text', 'class', __('Classification'), $rec_d['classification'], 'style="width: 40%;"');
00364     // biblio publisher
00365         // AJAX expression
00366         $ajax_exp = "ajaxFillSelect('AJAX_lookup_handler.php', 'mst_publisher', 'publisher_id:publisher_name', 'publisherID', $('publ_search_str').getValue())";
00367         if ($rec_d['publisher_name']) {
00368             $publ_options[] = array($rec_d['publisher_id'], $rec_d['publisher_name']);
00369         }
00370         $publ_options[] = array('0', __('Publisher'));
00371         // string element
00372         $str_input = simbio_form_element::selectList('publisherID', $publ_options, '', 'style="width: 50%;"');
00373         $str_input .= '&nbsp;';
00374         $str_input .= simbio_form_element::textField('text', 'publ_search_str', '', 'style="width: 45%;" onkeyup="'.$ajax_exp.'"');
00375     $form->addAnything(__('Publisher'), $str_input);
00376     // biblio publish year
00377     $form->addTextField('text', 'year', __('Publishing Year'), $rec_d['publish_year'], 'style="width: 40%;"');
00378     // biblio publish place
00379         // AJAX expression
00380         $ajax_exp = "ajaxFillSelect('AJAX_lookup_handler.php', 'mst_place', 'place_id:place_name', 'placeID', $('plc_search_str').getValue())";
00381         // string element
00382         if ($rec_d['place_name']) {
00383             $plc_options[] = array($rec_d['publish_place_id'], $rec_d['place_name']);
00384         }
00385         $plc_options[] = array('0', __('Publishing Place'));
00386         $str_input = simbio_form_element::selectList('placeID', $plc_options, '', 'style="width: 50%;"');
00387         $str_input .= '&nbsp;';
00388         $str_input .= simbio_form_element::textField('text', 'plc_search_str', '', 'style="width: 45%;" onkeyup="'.$ajax_exp.'"');
00389     $form->addAnything(__('Publishing Place'), $str_input);
00390     // biblio collation
00391     $form->addTextField('text', 'collation', __('Collation'), $rec_d['collation'], 'style="width: 40%;"');
00392     // biblio series title
00393     $form->addTextField('textarea', 'seriesTitle', __('Series Title'), $rec_d['series_title'], 'rows="1" style="width: 100%;"');
00394     // biblio call_number
00395     $form->addTextField('text', 'callNumber', __('Call Number'), $rec_d['call_number'], 'style="width: 40%;"');
00396     // biblio topics
00397         $str_input = '<div class="'.$visibility.'"><a href="javascript: openWin(\''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/pop_topic.php?biblioID='.$rec_d['biblio_id'].'\', \'popTopic\', 500, 200, true)">'.__('Add Subject(s)').'</a></div>';
00398         $str_input .= '<iframe name="topicIframe" id="topicIframe" class="borderAll" style="width: 100%; height: 70px;" src="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_topic.php?biblioID='.$rec_d['biblio_id'].'"></iframe>';
00399     $form->addAnything(__('Subject(s)'), $str_input);
00400     // biblio language
00401         // get language data related to this record from database
00402         $lang_q = $dbs->query("SELECT language_id, language_name FROM mst_language");
00403         $lang_options = array();
00404         while ($lang_d = $lang_q->fetch_row()) {
00405             $lang_options[] = array($lang_d[0], $lang_d[1]);
00406         }
00407     $form->addSelectList('languageID', __('Language'), $lang_options, $rec_d['language_id']);
00408     // biblio note

00478     // callback function to show title and authors in datagrid
00479     function showTitleAuthors($obj_db, $array_data)
00480     {
00481         // biblio author detail
00482         $_biblio_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT b.title, a.author_name, opac_hide, promoted FROM biblio AS b
00483             LEFT JOIN biblio_author AS ba ON b.biblio_id=ba.biblio_id
00484             LEFT JOIN mst_author AS a ON ba.author_id=a.author_id
00485             WHERE b.biblio_id='.$array_data[0]);
00486         $_authors = '';
00487         while ($_biblio_d = $_biblio_q->fetch_row()) {
00488             $_title = $_biblio_d[0];
00489             $_authors .= $_biblio_d[1].' - ';
00490             $_opac_hide = (integer)$_biblio_d[2];
00491             $_promoted = (integer)$_biblio_d[3];
00492         }
00493         $_authors = substr_replace($_authors, '', -3);
00494         $_output = '<div style="float: left;"><b>'.$_title.'</b><br /><i>'.$_authors.'</i></div>';
00495         // check for opac hide flag
00496         if ($_opac_hide) {
00497             $_output .= '<div style="float: right; width: 20px; height: 20px;" class="lockFlagIcon" title="Hidden in OPAC">&nbsp;</div>';
00498         }
00499         // check for promoted flag
00500         if ($_promoted) {
00501             $_output .= '<div style="float: right; width: 20px; height: 20px;" class="homeFlagIcon" title="Promoted To Homepage">&nbsp;</div>';
00502         }
00503         return $_output;
00504     }
00505 
00506     // create datagrid
00507     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00508     if ($can_read AND $can_write) {
00509         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('biblio.biblio_id', 'biblio.biblio_id AS bid',
00510             'biblio.title AS \''.__('Title').'\'',
00511             'biblio.isbn_issn AS \''.__('ISBN/ISSN').'\'',
00512             'IF(COUNT(item.item_id)>0, COUNT(item.item_id), \'<strong style="color: #FF0000;">'.__('None').'</strong>\') AS \''.__('Copies').'\'',
00513             'biblio.last_update AS \''.__('Last Update').'\'');
00514         $datagrid->modifyColumnContent(2, 'callback{showTitleAuthors}');
00515     } else {
00516         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('biblio.biblio_id AS bid', 'biblio.title AS \''.__('Title').'\'',
00517             'biblio.isbn_issn AS \''.__('ISBN/ISSN').'\'',
00518             'IF(COUNT(item.item_id)>0, COUNT(item.item_id), \'<strong style="color: #FF0000;">'.__('None').'</strong>\') AS \''.__('Copies').'\'',
00519             'biblio.last_update AS \''.__('Last Update').'\'');
00520         // modify column value
00521         $datagrid->modifyColumnContent(1, 'callback{showTitleAuthors}');
00522     }
00523     $datagrid->invisible_fields = array(0);
00524     $datagrid->setSQLorder('biblio.last_update DESC');
00525 
00526     // is there any search
00527     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00528         $keywords = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00529         $searchable_fields = array('title', 'author', 'subject', 'isbn', 'publisher');
00530         if ($_GET['field'] != '0' AND in_array($_GET['field'], $searchable_fields)) {
00531             $field = $_GET['field'];
00532             $search_str = $field.'='.$keywords;
00533         } else {
00534             $search_str = '';
00535             foreach ($searchable_fields as $search_field) {
00536                 $search_str .= $search_field.'='.$keywords.' OR ';
00537             }
00538             $search_str = substr_replace($search_str, '', -4);
00539         }
00540 
00541         $biblio_list = new biblio_list($dbs);
00542         $criteria = $biblio_list->setSQLcriteria($search_str);
00543     }
00544 
00545     if (isset($criteria)) {
00546         $datagrid->setSQLcriteria('('.$criteria['sql_criteria'].')');
00547     }
00548     // table spec
00549     $table_spec = 'biblio LEFT JOIN item ON biblio.biblio_id=item.biblio_id';
00550 
00551     // set group by
00552     $datagrid->sql_group_by = 'biblio.biblio_id';
00553 
00554     // set table and table header attributes
00555     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00556     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00557     // set delete proccess URL
00558     $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00559     $datagrid->debug = true;
00560 
00561     // put the result into variables
00562     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, ($can_read AND $can_write));
00563     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00564         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00565         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"<div>'.__('Query took').' <b>'.$datagrid->query_time.'</b> '.__('second(s) to complete').'</div></div>'; //mfc
00566     }
00567 
00568     echo $datagrid_result;
00569 }
